snippet: Ormskirk is a cute, long-headed chap; and, knowing the man well, I wasreally not surprised when, yesterday morning, I received a letter fromhim advising me that, without any difficulty, he had 'struck' the rightLaurieston, and that through our corresponding agent in Falkirk thepicture in question had been secured.

title: The Heather-Moon
author: Williamson, C. N. (Charles Norris)
snippet: Falkirk is a coalfield as well as a battlefield, and the murk ofcollieries and iron works darkens the sky as once did the smoke ofgunpowder: but the place holds its old interest for the mind; and notfar off we came to the Wallace Monument; then to Bannockburn.
